text: nam kuritta kalattil (kurippitta itattil) musa vanta potu, avarutaiya iraivan avarutan pecinan; appotu musa"en iraivane! Nan unnaip parkka ventum; enakku unnaik kanpippayaka! Enru ventinar. Atarku avan, "musave! Nir ennai orukkalum parkka mutiyatu, eninum nir inta malaiyaip parttuk kontirum. Atu tan itattil nilaittiruntal, appotu nir ennaip parppir!" Enru kurinan. Akave avarutaiya iraivan am'malai mitu tannutaiya peroliyait torruvitta potu, avan am'malaiyai norukkit tulakki vittan; appotu musa murccaiyakik kile viluntu vittar. Avar telivataintatum, "(iraiva!) Ni mikavum paricattamanavan; nan unnitam mannippu korukiren. Iman kontavarkalil nan mutanmaiyanavanaka irukkiren" enru kurinar
